attributes.background: Graves are broken and ramble  weeds grass all covering broken grave stones

rejection.details:
This cemetery seems to be run by a private company. This could be something you could raise directly with the company.

You could also raise this issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
